Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • a2.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sprite
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dagger, DumbTargeting, Player, SmartTargetEnemy, StraightLine, WallFollowing

extends java.lang.Object
implements Sprite
    This hold the Entity superclass.

    1.0
